title: my pbe account
body: so i made my pbe account and it says it was made, i tried logging onto pbe after and it didn't work idk why

replies.body: Hey there, what error message are you getting exactly?  See if a[ password reset ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751734-Recovering-Your-Password)might be able to help you out,.  You'll also be able to double check your email address  through our[ management page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751934-General-Account-Information) to make sure it's going to the right place.
when can you help me out?

Hey there, if this is still an issue reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Our account team will be able to work with you directly to get that back, and will respond back as soon as they can!
is it possible for you to remove my pbe account and let me make a new one?
i think the problem is that i made my pbe account username the same as my actual so like whenever i try doing the forget password it goes to my na account
so did anyone remove my pbe account so i can get a new one? because i still can't log into it
Hey, i have the same problem. On pbe signups it says i already have account but on client it says that this account does not exist

so i tried change password and it says , please use a different password from before, so i know its my username but when i try to recover username, i don't get an  email back
someone help
